promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute legendary cat fire-type pokemon wearing golden bracers. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or cat. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Bracerix, a a chibi cute legendary cat fire-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Savage Wing, Wink Wink. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "cat", "fire" or "Bracerix". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, cat-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, red and purple ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This petite, legendary feline flares with feisty warmth. Lurking in arid habitats, Bracerix captivates foes with Wink Wink and strikes mightily with Savage Wing.
